snippet: A battle has broken out over a horned, frilled dinosaur called torosaurus — namely, whether the animal ever existed.
abstract: Dr Nicholas Longrich and Daniel Field study in journal PLoS One finds that dinosaurs torosaurus and triceratops are separate species, refuting theory by Dr John R Horner that they were merely juvenile and adult specimens of the same dinosaur.
lead_paragraph: A battle has broken out over a horned, frilled dinosaur called torosaurus — namely, whether the animal ever existed.

headline.seo: Triceratops’ Quiet Cousin, Torosaurus, Gains a Recognition
headline.main: Triceratops’ Quiet Cousin, the Torosaurus, Gains New Legitimacy
headline.print_headline: Triceratops’ Quiet Cousin, the Torosaurus, Gains New Legitimacy
